scripts.ci: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run generate
scripts.stage: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/templates && cp -v registry.json build/ && cp -v schema.json build/ && if [ -d public ]; then rsync -a public/ build/; fi && rsync -a --delete templates/ build/templates/
scripts.deploy: pnpm run stage && wrangler version deploy
scripts.dev: pnpm run generate && pnpm run stage && wrangler dev
